Section.Catchline: Criminal actions involving elderly persons or disabled adults; speedy trial.

SectionBody.Text: In a criminal action in which an elderly person or disabled adult is a victim, the state may move the court to advance the trial on the docket. The presiding judge, after consideration of the age and health of the victim, may advance the trial on the docket. The motion may be filed and served with the information or charges or at any time thereafter.
